sections.heading: of Regents; organization; property; powers
sections.text: The Board of Regents shall have full power to appoint its own presiding officer and secretary. It shall constitute a body corporate, to be known as the Board of Regents of the University of Nebraska, and as such may sue and be sued and may make and use a co

sections.heading: VII, section 10, Constitution of Nebraska, and this section do not grant power to waive immunity from suit in federal court
sections.text: Board of Regents of University of Nebraska v. Dawes, 370 F.Supp. 1190 (D. Neb. 1974).
